title: New Movies & TV Shows From March: What to Watch Right Now
sub_head: A new ‘Batman,’ Brits behaving badly in the second season of ‘Bridgerton,’ startup controversies and more.
body:
Here’s a roundup of that month’s most noteworthy movies and TV shows, as covered by The Wall Street Journal’s critics.
Amanda Seyfried stars as Elizabeth Holmes in this eight-part show based on the podcast of the same name
